episode.title: Fussy Typography Improvements
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Paul Kafasis returns to the show to talk about Friday Night Baseball, Rogue Amoeba’s new Audio Hijack 4 release, and a bit of speculation on WWDC.
